segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle, still drying that same plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is probably getting wet, but she’s still focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one has stopped this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the stool is wobbling—this is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
